soundQuality.title: Sound Quality
soundQuality.description: Select the sound quality for your music
soundQuality.longDescription: This section lets you adjust the audio playback quality, directly affecting clarity and data usage. Higher quality delivers richer, more detailed sound but consumes more bandwidth, while lower quality reduces data usage at the cost of some audio detail. Choose the option that best suits your listening preferences and network conditions.

theme.title: Theme
theme.longDescription: This section allows you to customize the app’s appearance. The Light theme provides a bright interface, while the Dark theme offers a dimmer look that’s easier on the eyes in low-light environments. Selecting System will match the app’s theme to your device’s system settings, automatically switching between light and dark modes as configured on your device.

language.title: Language
language.longDescription: This section allows you to set the app's display language. Choosing English or Spanish will keep the app in that language regardless of your device settings. Selecting System will match the app’s language to your device’s preferred language for a seamless experience.

backgroundAnimation.title: Background Animation
backgroundAnimation.longDescription: This section lets you control the background animation in the full-screen music player. Enabling it adds dynamic visuals for an immersive experience. Disabling it keeps the background static, which may help conserve battery life.
